definition: to mistake one thing for another
details:
verb
- to mistake one thing for another
= example: to mistake one thing for another
= synonyms: confound
- to make unclear, indistinct, or blurred
= example: to make unclear, indistinct, or blurred
= synonyms: obscure
- to be confusing or perplexing to
= example: to be confusing or perplexing to
= synonyms: throw
- to assemble without order or sense
= example: to assemble without order or sense
= synonyms: jumble
- to cause to feel embarrassment
= example: to cause to feel embarrassment
= synonyms: flurry
